Scripts.OnClick:
if self.checked then self.checked = false self.Check:SetTexture("Interface\\RAIDFRAME\\ReadyCheck-NotReady") elseif self.checked == false then self.checked = nil self.Check:SetTexture(nil) elseif self.checked == nil then self.checked = true self.Check:SetTexture("Interface\\RAIDFRAME\\ReadyCheck-Ready") end TMW.CNDT:RuneHandler(self)
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent():GetParent() local condition = CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings() for k, rune in pairs(self:GetParent()) do if type(rune) == "table" then condition.Runes[rune:GetID()] = rune:GetChecked() end end CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()
Scripts.OnLoad:
self.GetChecked = TMW.CNDT.Rune_GetChecked self.SetChecked = TMW.CNDT.Rune_SetChecked
-- detect what texture should be used local runeName = gsub(self:GetName(), self:GetParent():GetName(), "") local runeType, death = runeName:match("(.*)%d(.*)")
if death and death ~= "" then self.texture:SetTexture("Interface\\AddOns\\TellMeWhen\\Textures\\" .. runeType) else self.texture:SetTexture("Interface\\PlayerFrame\\UI-PlayerFrame-Deathknight-" .. runeType) end

if strfind(self:GetParent():GetName(), "Close") then self.type = ")" else self.type = "(" end self.text:SetText(self.type) function self:SetChecked(checked) self:Show() local oldstate = self.checked self.checked = checked if checked then local next = self:GetParent()[self:GetID() + 1] if next then next:Show() elseif self:GetID() < 13 then next = CreateFrame("CheckButton", self:GetParent():GetName() .. self:GetID() + 1, self:GetParent(), "TellMeWhen_ConditionEditorParenthesisTemplate", self:GetID() + 1) self:GetParent()[self:GetID() + 1] = next local a, _, c, d, e = self:GetPoint() next:SetPoint(a, self, c, d, e) next:Show() next:SetChecked(nil) end else local last = self:GetParent()[self:GetID() - 1] if type(last) == "table" and not last.checked then self:Hide() end for i = self:GetID() + 1, #self:GetParent() do self:GetParent()[i]:SetChecked(nil) self:GetParent()[i]:Hide() end end
if oldstate ~= checked then -- TMW.CNDT:ColorizeParentheses() end end
function self:GetChecked() return self.checked end self:GetParent()[self:GetID()] = self
Scripts.OnClick:
TMW.HELP:Hide("CNDT_PARENTHESES_FIRSTSEE")
self:SetChecked(not self.checked)
local n = 0 if self:GetParent():IsShown() then for k, frame in pairs(self:GetParent()) do if type(frame) == "table" and frame:GetChecked() then n = n + 1 end end end
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent():GetParent() if self.type == "(" then CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings().PrtsBefore = n else CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings().PrtsAfter = n end CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()
TMW.CNDT:ColorizeParentheses()

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost:
EditBox_ClearHighlight(self) TMW:CleanString(self)
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent() local unit = strtrim(self:GetText()) or "player"
CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings().Unit = unit CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()
local unitTable = TMW.UNITS:GetOriginalUnitTable(unit) if #unitTable > 1 then TMW.HELP:Show("CNDT_UNIT_ONLYONE", TMW.CI.ic, self, 0, 0, TMW.L["HELP_ONLYONEUNIT"], #unitTable) end if self:GetText() == "" then TMW.HELP:Show("CNDT_UNIT_MISSING", TMW.CI.ic, self, 0, 0, TMW.L["HELP_NOUNIT"]) end

Scripts.OnUpdate:
-- This code handles changing the value text when the slider is adjusted using click-and-drag. -- CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw() can't be used because it forces an update using the current Level setting, -- which either results in a completely locked slider if Level isn't set here before calling :LoadAndDraw, -- or it results in a hypersensitive slider that updates its range every single frame. -- Therefore, we just extract the text updating code and let it stand alone -- without actually modifying any settings in this script handler.
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent()
if not CndtGroup.GetConditionData then return end
local conditionData = CndtGroup:GetConditionData() local value = self:GetValue() CndtGroup.ValText:SetText(TMW.get(conditionData.texttable, value) or value)
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if button == "RightButton" and self:GetParent():GetSliderEditBoxAllowance() then self:GetParent().SliderInputBox:Show() self:GetParent():LoadAndDraw() end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: local CndtGroup = self:GetParent() local condition = CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings() condition.Level = TMW.CNDT:ValidateLevelForCondition(self:GetValue(), condition.Type) CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()
Scripts.OnMouseWheel:
if IsShiftKeyDown() then delta = delta*10 end if IsControlKeyDown() then delta = delta*60 -- (60 seconds) end
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent()
if delta == 1 or delta == -1 then delta = delta*(CndtGroup:GetConditionData().step or 1) end
local condition = CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings() condition.Level = TMW.CNDT:ValidateLevelForCondition(self:GetValue()+delta, condition.Type) CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost:
EditBox_ClearHighlight(self) TMW:CleanString(self)
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent() local condition = CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings() condition.Level = TMW.CNDT:ValidateLevelForCondition(self:GetText(), condition.Type) CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if button == "RightButton" and self:GetParent():GetSliderAllowance() then self:GetParent().Slider:Show() end
Scripts.OnMouseWheel:
if IsShiftKeyDown() then delta = delta*10 end if IsControlKeyDown() then delta = delta*60 -- (60 seconds) end
local step = self:GetParent():GetConditionData().step if delta == 1 or delta == -1 then delta = delta*(step or 1) end self:GetParent():SetSliderMinMax(self:GetText()+delta)
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent() local condition = CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings() condition.Level = TMW.CNDT:ValidateLevelForCondition(self:GetText(), condition.Type) CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost:
EditBox_ClearHighlight(self) TMW:CleanString(self)
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent() CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings().Name = strtrim(self:GetText()) or "" CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()

EditBox_ClearHighlight(self) TMW:CleanString(self)
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent() CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings().Name2 = strtrim(self:GetText()) or "" CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()

Scripts.OnClick: local CndtGroup = self:GetParent() CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings().Checked = not not self:GetChecked() CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent() CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings().Checked2 = not not self:GetChecked() CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.text:SetText(TMW.L["CONDITIONPANEL_RUNES_CHECK"]) self.text:SetPoint("TOP", 0, -4) self.text:SetPoint("RIGHT", self:GetParent(), "RIGHT") self.text:SetHeight(40) self.text:SetMaxLines(5) self.text:SetJustifyV("TOP")
TMW:TT(self, "CONDITIONPANEL_RUNES_CHECK", "CONDITIONPANEL_RUNES_CHECK_DESC")
Scripts.OnClick: local CndtGroup = self:GetParent() CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings().Checked = not not self:GetChecked() CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()

Scripts.OnLoad:
local AND, OR = TMW.L["CONDITIONPANEL_AND"], TMW.L["CONDITIONPANEL_OR"] local GRAY = "|cff222222" local SLASH = "/" local WHITE = "|r" local AND_t = WHITE .. AND .. GRAY .. SLASH .. OR local OR_t = GRAY .. AND .. SLASH .. WHITE .. OR
function self:SetValue(value) local text
if value == "AND" then text = AND_t elseif value == "OR" then text = OR_t end
self.text:SetText(text) self.value = value self:SetWidth(self.text:GetWidth()) end function self:GetValue() return self.value end
TMW:TT(self, "CONDITIONPANEL_ANDOR", "CONDITIONPANEL_ANDOR_DESC") self:SetValue("AND")
Scripts.OnClick:
TMW.HELP:Hide("CNDT_ANDOR_FIRSTSEE")
if self.value == "AND" then self:SetValue("OR") elseif self.value == "OR" then self:SetValue("AND") end
local CndtGroup = self:GetParent() CndtGroup:GetConditionSettings().AndOr = self:GetValue() CndtGroup:LoadAndDraw()

Scripts.OnLoad:
TMW:ConvertContainerToScrollFrame(self, false, -2)
TMW.CNDT:CreateGroups(1) TMW.CNDT[1].AndOr:Hide() TMW.CNDT[1].CloseParenthesis:Hide() TMW.CNDT[1]:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 12, -16)

self.text:SetText(TMW.L["CONDITIONPANEL_ADD2"]) TMW:TT(self, "CONDITIONPANEL_ADD") self.Plus:ClearAllPoints() self.Plus:SetPoint("RIGHT", self.text, "LEFT", -10, 0) self.Plus2:ClearAllPoints() self.Plus2:SetPoint("LEFT", self.text, "RIGHT", 10, 0)
